## Current Research Projects

### Multiscale Modelling of Flows

Research into flows spanning from the nano- to macro-scale, using molecular dynamics, kinetic theory, and continuum methods.

[Learn more at mfX Group Website](https://multiscaleflowx.github.io/)

### Interfacial Phenomena

Study of the physics at the boundary between two phases, including droplet dynamics and heat transfer.

### Nucleation and Phase Change

Investigation of ice formation, boiling, and cavitation at the nanoscale.
